      Returns:
      the authToken Model

    • ReturnResult

      public RegisterResult ReturnResult​(AuthTokenModel token)
      Returns the Result form to the Handler
      Parameters:
      token - token to add to result form (used to fetch username and personID), null if registration failed
      Returns:
      RegisterResult object describing success or failure
